title: Learning to read maps. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Acorn Films and David Jay
brief_description: A mimed fantasy about a lost clown who helps children understand the usefulness of maps. Teaches students that maps are graphic representations of real places, how to recognize symbols representing physical features on maps, how to find directions without using a compass and how to calculate distances to a destination.
